title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 09 July 2009 - XWiki
content:

lucaa joined #xwiki at 11:01  
tmortagne joined #xwiki at 11:08  
anamarias left at 11:08 (Read error: 113 (No route to host))  
cristinaS joined #xwiki at 11:15  
Enygma` joined #xwiki at 11:17  
anamarias joined #xwiki at 11:29  
theo\_\_\_ joined #xwiki at 11:30  
theo\_\_\_ - (09/07/2009 11:30): hi people  
theo\_\_\_ - (09/07/2009 11:32): i created a class using the XWikiClass editor but it seems that something is going wrong with the header  
theo\_\_\_ - (09/07/2009 11:32): this class has been created in another space than XWiki  
theo\_\_\_ - (09/07/2009 11:33): but the header displays : Space:WebHome > Welcome to the Class Editor > Created Class  
theo\_\_\_ - (09/07/2009 11:33): WebHome is the XWiki WebHome while the Created Class is in the Space space  
arkub joined #xwiki at 11:34  
lucaa3 joined #xwiki at 11:35  
lucaa left at 11:35 (Read error: 104 (Connection reset by peer))  
theo\_\_\_ left at 11:39 (Ping timeout: 180 seconds)  
theo\_\_\_\_ joined #xwiki at 11:39  
theo\_\_\_\_ - (09/07/2009 11:40): hep back  
theo\_\_\_\_ - (09/07/2009 11:40): did anyone reply ?  
theo\_\_\_\_ - (09/07/2009 11:40): some troubles with my internet connection...  
tachirei joined #xwiki at 11:42  
anamarias left at 11:42 ()  
tachirei left #xwiki at 11:42  
anamarias joined #xwiki at 11:44  
theo\_\_\_\_ - (09/07/2009 11:49): :)  
lucaa3 - (09/07/2009 11:52): hi theo\_\_\_\_ but that's normal  
lucaa3 - (09/07/2009 11:52): the breadcumbs show parents, not spaces  
theo\_\_\_\_ - (09/07/2009 11:52): ok  
theo\_\_\_\_ - (09/07/2009 11:52): but  
theo\_\_\_\_ - (09/07/2009 11:53): where is that parent specified ?  
theo\_\_\_\_ - (09/07/2009 11:53): #set($defaultparent = "${doc.space}.${class}Class") ?  
theo\_\_\_\_ - (09/07/2009 11:53): that is for the objects implementing that class  
theo\_\_\_\_ - (09/07/2009 11:53): i think  
lucaa3 - (09/07/2009 11:54): I think the parent for the classes created from the class editor is the Class editor  
theo\_\_\_\_ - (09/07/2009 11:54): can i change that ?  
lucaa3 - (09/07/2009 11:54): you can checkout in the url, it is passed as a parameter when editing the newly created class  
lucaa3 - (09/07/2009 11:55): the parent of a class? of course  
lucaa3 - (09/07/2009 11:55): on creation time, if you explicitly pass the parent parameter  
theo\_\_\_\_ - (09/07/2009 11:55): in the url ?  
lucaa3 - (09/07/2009 11:55): or on edit time, in the panel to the right  
lucaa3 - (09/07/2009 11:55): yes  
theo\_\_\_\_ - (09/07/2009 11:56): aaaaaaaah !!  
theo\_\_\_\_ - (09/07/2009 11:56): great !!  
theo\_\_\_\_ - (09/07/2009 11:56): i missed the right panel !  
theo\_\_\_\_ - (09/07/2009 11:56): thanks a lot !  
lucaa3 - (09/07/2009 11:57): :)  
lucaa3 - (09/07/2009 11:57): theo\_\_\_\_: is it not visible, or was it just you?  
theo\_\_\_\_ - (09/07/2009 11:58): just me :p  
lucaa3 - (09/07/2009 11:58): k  
theo\_\_\_\_ - (09/07/2009 11:58): very intelligent question by the way  
lucaa3 - (09/07/2009 11:58): theo\_\_\_\_: huh?  
theo\_\_\_\_ - (09/07/2009 11:59): it's nice to know that you are in a way to improve XWiki continuously  
theo\_\_\_\_ - (09/07/2009 11:59): :)  
lucaa3 - (09/07/2009 11:59): mnehehehehehe :) of course

anamarias joined #xwiki at 13:12  
anamarias - (09/07/2009 13:12): sdumitriu: hi. just wanted to let you know that I solved the xwiki component building problem I had yesterday  
sdumitriu - (09/07/2009 13:13): Great  
mflorea joined #xwiki at 13:13  
jvdrean left at 13:20 ()  
arunreddy\_ - (09/07/2009 13:32): sdumitriu: Hi  
arunreddy\_ - (09/07/2009 13:33): the wiki importer supports mediawiki and confluence too.  
sdumitriu - (09/07/2009 13:39): Cool  
arunreddy\_ left at 13:43 (Remote closed the connection)  
anamarias - (09/07/2009 13:45): The implementation for a component interface must be located at \_interface-package-path\_.internal, or can it be located in any package ?  
anamarias - (09/07/2009 13:45): with no restrictions  
rrodriguez left at 13:54 ()  
rrodriguez joined #xwiki at 13:56  
rrodriguez left at 13:59 (Client Quit)  
sdumitriu left at 13:59 (Read error: 110 (Connection timed out))  
tachirei joined #xwiki at 14:17  
arunreddy joined #xwiki at 14:35  
sdumitriu joined #xwiki at 14:44  
lucien joined #xwiki at 15:00  
theo\_\_\_\_ - (09/07/2009 15:08): is there a way to edit "inline" pages ?  
sdumitriu - (09/07/2009 15:09): What do you mean?  
rrodriguez joined #xwiki at 15:29  
jvelociter\_ joined #xwiki at 15:48  
jvelociter left at 15:48 (Read error: 104 (Connection reset by peer))  
theo\_\_\_\_ - (09/07/2009 15:48): sdumitriu: i mean, provide default value for String fields for instance  
theo\_\_\_\_ - (09/07/2009 15:48): (sorry for the delay :p)  
sdumitriu - (09/07/2009 15:49): For that you must edit the template object  
sdumitriu - (09/07/2009 15:49): If the values are constant  
sdumitriu - (09/07/2009 15:50): Or the sheet, if you want to set values using velocity  
rrodriguez left at 16:05 (Read error: 110 (Connection timed out))  
florinciu joined #xwiki at 16:19  
j-saturne joined #xwiki at 16:36  
tachirei - (09/07/2009 17:22): florinciu: 2 questions regarding XOFFICE-127  
tachirei - (09/07/2009 17:22): - this should go to trunk, 1.0 branch, or both?  
tachirei - (09/07/2009 17:22): - should I also create an AddObjectAsync?  
florinciu - (09/07/2009 17:22): both  
arunreddy left at 17:23 (Remote closed the connection)  
florinciu - (09/07/2009 17:23): yes, you should create an async method too  
florinciu - (09/07/2009 17:24): don't forget to create the completed event  
tachirei - (09/07/2009 17:25): ok. thanks  
anamarias left at 17:26 ()  
florinciu - (09/07/2009 17:26): tachirei: btw, I added version 1.1 M1 to the XOffice versions on jira  
florinciu - (09/07/2009 17:27): please set the fix version for all style related issues to 1.1 M1  
tachirei - (09/07/2009 17:28): ok
